title: Snowball
text:
Tools specified for a navigation bar will appear on the right side of the Navbar. If you specify a dark theme or reader mode for your website, the controls for those STOP options will appear with any specified tools.

title: Rubricas
text:
Rubricas são thing to links between pages in your site, you can provide.

O que são
The source file as the link target (rather than the .html file). You can also add hash identifiers (#) to the source file if you want to link to a particular section in the document. For example:
One benefit of using this style of link as opposed to targeting .html files directly is that if you at some point convert your site to a book the file-based links will automatically resolve to section links for formats that produce a single file (e.g. PDF or MS Word)
